name: Starship Universe
description:
STARSHIP UNIVERSE,

The year 2100, technology has allow humans to travel in the solar system with starships. However, begins a new conflict of power battle between factions, corporation and government to dominate terrortory.

In the midst of civil war in the solar system, aliens begins to emerge begins a new era of war.

You play as a starship commander to command your starship to destroy our enemies and defend our base by ourselves or by a group of allies we trust.

Details

Genre                 : 4 player local coop, shoot-em-up, Hybrid Strategy

Platform           : Window PC

Software          : Game maker 1.4 , Piskel

Duration          : 2 month (still in development). Will announce once completion. Please follow us at our facebook page:  https://www.facebook.com/starshipcommanderUniverse/

** Updates 4/4/2018 :

1. Map updated.

2. Bugs fixed

3. Much more stable.
